name: Gate OF Sacrifice
description:
Gate of Sacrifice was started this year as an assignment for University. It marks my first steps as a game designer and I have refined the game somewhat over the year. The game is okay. 

The game is challenging to say the least. 

--Controls--

Arrows to move   - down arrow to pass-through floors

Z and X to attack

Space to interact

Shift + arrows = front dash 

Shift + No arrows = Back Dash

Good Luck Havefun
